settings.content: Please note that, Shopify always proceeds orders according to your shop's currency no matter what currency is displayed.
This requires [RoarTheme Weketing](https://wiki.roartheme.com/weketing) to be installed beforehand.

settings.label: Supported Currencies
settings.info: Separate your currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. Click [here](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) for a complete list of currency codes. Sample: CAD USD.

settings.content: Please note that the Filters will be disabled if Collection Sidebar is turn off.
These settings are for Advanced Product Item style ONLY

settings.label: Show New Badge
settings.info: Set tag 'latest' to a product to enable this badge

settings.label: Main Image Width
settings.info: Only apply for 'Thumbnails Left' and 'Thumbnails Bottom' on Product Design setting above

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the spelling to use here, refer to the first checkout page.

settings.label: Style
settings.info: If you choose Bright style, it's recommended that you should use a dark or non-white Background Image

options.label: All The Time with 'Do Not Show Again' Option

settings.label: 'Do Not Show Again' Time Period (in days)
Description
settings.default: This website contains adult material and is only suitable for those 18 years or older. Click Enter only if you are at least 18 years of age.

settings.content: All of these settings are about the type of each theme element and they are all optional. Making these changes does not affect the theme layout, it just changes the look of the elements. If you are not sure about them, just ignore.

settings.label: Overflow Mode
settings.info: This makes the Header Slider overflow on left & right sides a little bit. You have to set Slider Layout as 'Full Width' and Slider Placement as 'Within Container' before used.
